headline: Greta: Joan Rivers - A brash, undeniable pioneer
subHeadline: Greta's 'Off the Record' commentary, 9/4/14: Whether you thought Joan Rivers was too blunt or too brash, she was a trailblazer in the once-male-dominated world of stand-up comedy.

utterances.speaker: JOAN RIVERS
utterances.sentences: I'm from a little town call Larchmont where if you're not married, if you're a girl and you're over 21, you're better off dead. It's that simple, you know? Anybody that came to my house was it. Oh, Joan, there's the most attractive young man down here with a mask and a gun.
